io.confluent.ksql.serde

Interface ValueSerdeFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericRowSerDe

    public interface ValueSerdeFactory
    Factory of value serde instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Create a value serde.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Serde<GenericRow> create(FormatInfo format,
                                                               PersistenceSchema schema,
                                                               KsqlConfig ksqlConfig,
                                                               java.util.function.Supplier<io.confluent.kafka.schemaregistry.client.SchemaRegistryClient> schemaRegistryClientFactory,
                                                               java.lang.String loggerNamePrefix,
                                                               ProcessingLogContext processingLogContext,
                                                               java.util.Optional<TrackedCallback> tracker)
        Create a value serde.
        Parameters:
        format - the format required.
        schema - the schema of the serialized form.
        ksqlConfig - the system config.
        schemaRegistryClientFactory - supplier of SR client.
        loggerNamePrefix - processing logger name prefix
        processingLogContext - processing logger context.
        tracker - optional callback used to track serde operations.
        Returns:
        the value serde.
